title: Europa nostra
creator_credit: World Wide Pictures, Peter Bradford and Charles Mapleston
brief_description: Shot in fifteen countries in Western and Eastern Europe, this film touches upon all aspects of conservation, including: treasures lost, restoration, new uses for old buildings, traffic, pressures of tourism, unsightly advertising, and the activities of local authorities and conservation authorities.
